(899)                      June 28, 1910 -6- B.-61-1910. 
                                Sanitarium, Calif., April 27, 1910. 

Elder J. A. Burden, 

Dear Brother:- 
     I wish to express to you some thoughts that should be kept before the sanitarium workers. That which will make them a power for good is the knowledge that the great Medical Missionary 


                              -543- 

has chosen them to this work, that He is their chief instructor, and that it is ever their duty to recognize Him as their teacher.
